name: Customized Nursery Wall Letters
description:
Need some personalized wall decor? Here you can order any name or word in any design! Just contact me with the spelling of what you want, a brief description of what you want painted on it (you may include pictures), and any other details you would like me to include! I can replicate what I have done in the picture (for my daughter's room) as well. Let me know what you have in mind! Want your son's name with spaceships or monkeys? Want your daughter's name with a princess or garden theme? Have a message you want to display in your living room or kitchen? I can do that.

I buy the wooden lettering from various craft stores, this is the plain style, but they do have a more "whimsacle" type as well that would go well in a girl's room of any age!
I use acrylic paint and a seal to ensure no fading.
Ribbon & wall hangers not included.

Each letter is $7. Be sure to adjust the quantity you need when checking out.
Also be sure to include in your note if you want them in all capital letters, all lower case, alternating, or just the first letter capitalized.

name: Customized Picture Frames
description:
Choose from 3x5, 5x5, or 4x6 Frame.
Hand painted wooden frame with acrylic paint.
I can make frames for pictures, or framed monogram letters (both shown).
Give a personal, hand painted gift or just grab one for yourself! Perfect for nurseries, family pictures, graduation, friendship pictures, and any other occasion you can think of!
Contact me letting me know what size, design, and letter (for monogram frames) you would like. Pictures and any other details you would like me to include are absolutely welcome!

So try me out, let me know if you want a jungle theme to match your nursery, or two matching frames for you and your best friend. If you can describe it, or show me some inspiration for what's on your mind, I can paint it!

name: Baby Wipe Cases
description:
Custom made baby wipe cases! Choose from a variety of patterns & designs and I will embellish with ribbons, buttons, and a monogram if you wish:

Yellow Monkeys
Dark Blue/Green Elephants
Pink & Yellow Owls
Brown Autumn Leaves
Plain Pale Pink
Plain Baby Blue
Orange/Yellow stripes & dots
Tourist
Yellow/Blue Paisley
Little Creatures & Bugs
Tan w/ Blue, Orange, Yellow, & White Jungle Animals
Pale Green with White Polka Dots
Silky Red with Hollow & White drops
Orange Flowers & Ladybugs
Misc. Blue & Tan design
Orange Doodled Flowers


Bottom Options:
Pale Pink
Pale Blue
Dark Brown
Light Tan
White


If you want to see a bigger picture of them before you purchase, contact me first and I can send you one. Fabric material varies, but all are padded for extra cushion and embellished. 
Also be sure to include in your message if you want a large monogram letter in the middle, or a small one in the corner, and what letter you want.
